name: Road to Slavorium
description:
Road to Slavorium is adventure side-scroll platformer. It is about guy with name Slaven searching for place called Slavorium. He need to pass all tests through different challenges and different levels to prove to his villagers that he is worthy to call him self "true slav". It is simple single player game with beautiful environment in which you can learn something about the place the developer come from. The game is like Slavic Super Mario...

Minimum system requirements:

CPU- Intel Pentium 2020M 2.40GHz

GPU- NVIDA GeForce 810M

RAM- 4 gb
